name: MAN TRILOGY
description:
It is a funny unfunny game for jokes and fun and remember kids don't do drugs!

The point of the game is to get the lowest IQ by taking choices that come up. It was inspired by baldis basics (hence the school theme) but it is a text-based game.

Pls tell me in the thread if there are any bugs in the game. There are some bugs that I can't fix like if you type no answer for the character it closes the game 

Try type everything in exactly how it says because it may not work if you don't 

Thanks lockness Ko
